text: Uye kana vachinge vaita Al-Faahishah (zvinonyadzisa, kutenderera Ka’bah vasina kupfeka, uye hupombwe) vanoti: “Takaona madzibaba edu achizviita, uye Allah vakazvikomekedza kwatiri.” Iti: “Zvirokwazvo, (Allah) havambokomekedzi Faahishah (zvinonyadzisa). Munotaura here pamusoro paAllah zvamusingazive?”
